I've saw more positive communities living on dung in Forests. After playing this game for two years I finally played survivor. Rank 20. 90% Of my matches were against Russians that had to derank in order to farm blood points simply because they couldn't win 100% of their games at rank 1. This game is not viable to new players in its current state. Especially when you get suspended from matchmaking for leaving games that are entirely ruined by these kinds of people.
